name: UrsaFont
description: 8x8 monospaced ANSI-inspired font for text art and games, with regular and inverted variants.

name: C64 Pro Mono
description: Monospaced font with all 304 Commodore 64 glyphs, ideal for PETSCII art and classic C64 aesthetics.

name: FROGBLOCK-V2.1
description: 8x8 monospaced font by Polyducks for text art and games, with special characters for artistic use.

name: CHUNKY
description: A bold 8x8 pixel font, offering a wide range of shapes and symbols for expressive textmode art.

name: Kitchen Sink
description: Compact 6x8 monospaced font with 256 characters and special symbols for text art, games, and creative designs.

name: PetMe64
description: Faithfully replicates the 40-column Commodore 64 character set, with added Unicode, box-drawing, and legacy computing symbols for retro projects.

name: ATASCII
description: 8x8 monospaced font based on Atari 8-bit and ST character sets, with extended Latin, Greek, Hebrew, and symbol support.

name: BESCII
description: 8×8 monospaced PETSCII-inspired font for BASIC Engine, supporting Western European, Greek, Cyrillic, kana, PETSCII, CPC 464, legacy computing, and pixel-art glyphs.

name: CPC464
description: 8×8 monospaced font based on Amstrad CPC 464, with extended Western European, Greek, and CPC symbols. Wide strokes for low-res screens.

name: Pixel Dingbats-7
description: Compact 8x8 pixel dingbat font with 221 symbols, including chess pieces, card suits, icons, and patterns for retro UI and pixel art.
